gt_text: i\hbar \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\Psi(\mathbf{r}, t) = \left[ -\frac{\hbar^2}{2m}\nabla^2 + V(\mathbf{r}, t) \right] \Psi(\mathbf{r}, t)
